message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL 

The paper proposes a framework for lifelong learning in deep neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the broad category of machine learning. Specifically, the paper focuses on the properties of non-forgetting, concept rehearsal, forward transfer and backward transfer of knowledge, few-shot learning, and selective forgetting, which are all relevant to the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also discusses the application of the framework to computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL), which are two popular areas of research in machine learning.
